column4: I need to benchmark something like cat foo | egrep ... | sed | awk | ...., how can I do that ?
use "time" it will be rough but a good idea
I looked at time manual, I couldnt find out how I should do that
just put time in front of it
you just put time in front of the comment
ahhh I see what your saying
time `your command | next command | next -i command | and another`
make sure your using back ticks
ahhh I see it's picking up additional output
yes, I see what your saying
